## Documentation Task Overview

**Task type:**  
- [ ] New documentation
- [ ] Update existing documentation
- [ ] Review and improve clarity
- [ ] Structural or navigation change

**Product area:**  
- [ ] Endpoint agent
- [ ] Exploit protection
- [ ] Ransomware protection
- [ ] Alerts and logs
- [ ] Policy management
- [ ] Installation and setup

---

## Problem Statement

Describe the documentation problem or gap.

Example:
Users need a clear explanation of how exploit protection works and what happens when an exploit attempt is blocked.

---

## Goal

What should the reader be able to understand or do after this documentation is complete?

Example:
Understand how exploit protection works and how to interpret related alerts.

---

## Target Audience

- [ ] IT administrators
- [ ] Security analysts
- [ ] SOC teams
- [ ] Technical support
- [ ] Mixed / non-security audience

---

## Scope of Work

What will this task include?

- [ ] Conceptual explanation
- [ ] Task-based steps
- [ ] Configuration guidance
- [ ] Alert interpretation
- [ ] Troubleshooting
- [ ] Reference information

## Content Outline

Proposed structure:

- Overview
- How it works
- User actions (if applicable)
- Alerts and outcomes
- Notes / limitations

## Acceptance Criteria

This task is complete when:

- [ ] Content is accurate and consistent
- [ ] Terminology aligns with SentinelEdge naming
- [ ] Steps are clear and actionable
- [ ] Markdown formatting is consistent
- [ ] Cross-links are added

---

## Review Checklist

- [ ] Reviewed for clarity and flow
- [ ] Reviewed from a user perspective
- [ ] Follows Microsoft Style Guide
- [ ] No unnecessary jargon
- [ ] Examples are realistic

`/docs/<section>/<file>.md`
